typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		date_created as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss',
		user_created as string,
		date_modified as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		date_created as timestamp,
		user_created as string,
		date_modified as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'yyyy/MM/dd',
	timestampFormat:'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
